mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum,w.*,l.lectureclass_class as lecture_class ,l.lecture_title,to_char(w.work_start,'yyyymmdd') as startday ,to_char(w.work_end,'yyyymmdd') as endday from (SELECT * FROM WORKS order by work_no desc) w join (select * from lecture join lectureclass using(lecture_no)) l on w.lecture_no = l.lecture_no )
select lecture_no,lecture_class,lecture_title from lecture where teacher_number = #{teacher_number}
